title: Language Practical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Task-Technology Matching

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Designing tasks based on real work scenarios to enhance applicability for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language skills (reading/writing/speaking/listening) required for specific work situations and select appropriate digital tools
Learners improve their language task performance ability by 20% by exchanging real-time feedback with peers on a collaboration platform
Learners can propose methods for applying personalized AI translation tools to work tasks using personal devices
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
